title: Drawing, "The Apothesis of Hercules, Palazzo Gessi, Faenza", 1813
medium: Pen and ink over graphite on light blue paper.
markings: Watermark: lily in double circle, above F, below A F C
inscribed: Inscription in Giani's hand: apoteosi di ercole alla preseza delli dei.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Hercules accompanied by genii presents to Zeus apples of Hesperidae. Sitting beside Zeus, Juno with peacock, Athena and other gods. Hebe pouring ambrosia in cup for Hercules. In foreground, at left, three putti, two with flowers, one pouring water from pitcher. Inscription in Giani's hand: apoteosi di ercole alla preseza delli dei.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "The Apothesis of Hercules, Palazzo Gessi, Faenza", 1813.
1813. Pen and ink over graphite on light blue paper.. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-1641.
